Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at La Prima Fashion Hotel Vienna in Vienna (Margareten), you'll be convenient to Third Man Museum and Vienna State Opera. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Naschmarkt and Theater an der Wien.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 49 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes, and both cribs/infant beds (complimentary) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at La Prima Fashion Hotel Vienna in Vienna (Margareten), you'll be convenient to Third Man Museum and Vienna State Opera. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Naschmarkt and Theater an der Wien.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Third Man Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Naschmarkt - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Theater an der Wien - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Vienna Furniture Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Secession Building - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Leopold Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Academy of Fine Arts Vienna - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Vienna University of Technology - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Karlsplatz - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
ORF Broadcasting House Vienna - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
St. Charle's Church - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Museumsquartier - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Museum of Art History - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Karlsplatz Stadbahn Station - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Raimund Theater - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for La Prima Fashion Hotel Vienna is Vienna (VIE-Vienna Intl.) - 16 km / 9.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
